page.title: 20Domesday Project Survey Team
page.content: s The following children were in Mr.Garlands top class (9-llyear olds) during the Summer Term l985 and joined in the gathering of information for the Domesday Project. Rebecca Neal, Paul Brockman, Gordon Ponting, Sally Buckingham, Cheryl Buckingham, Susan Fewkes, Samantha Affection, Trevor Chappell, Julie Watson, Michelle Brant, Susan Davis, Kirsty Jenkin, Timothy Cowley, Gareth Whittingham, Mary-Anne Pashley, Scott Patten, Sarah Corrigan, Dominic Neal, Richard Hall, Philip Gilson, Steven Taylor, Joanna Knight, Stephen Murley and Brett Jones. Adults who helped on the visits Mrs Joan Beaghen and Mrs Anne Irwin. The Project proved to be very stimulating and all involved learned a good deal more about their local environment.
